problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, AC = N_1, AB = N_2. Take B as the center and make a circle tangent to AC, then the radius of the circle is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵∠ACB=90°,即AC⊥BC,∴当圆的半径等于BC=√{AB^{2}-AC^{2}}=√{10^{2}-6^{2}}=8时,以B为圆心作圆与BC相切．故选:D．
